
[[_uploadusingput_1]]
==== 普通文件流上传
....
PUT /upload
....


===== 说明
使用普通文件流上传


===== 参数

[options="header", cols=".^2a,.^3a,.^9a,.^4a,.^2a"]
|===
|类型|名称|说明|类型|默认值
|*Header*|*Authorization* +
_必填_|authorization header|string|`"bearer dc671840-bacc-4dc5-a134-97c1918d664b"`
|*Header*|*Content-Length* +
_可选_|数据流文件长度|integer (int64)|
|*Query*|*name* +
_必填_|文件的全名，使用URL编码（UTF-8），最多256个字符|string|
|*Query*|*sourceId* +
_可选_|调用方的文件源ID，不能重复|string|
|===


===== 响应

[options="header", cols=".^2a,.^14a,.^4a"]
|===
|HTTP代码|说明|类型
|*200*|OK|<<_d9ca73ac43d7c6ced2c047acc5c261c5,GeneralResponse«FileBean»>>
|*201*|Created|无内容
|*401*|Unauthorized|无内容
|*403*|Forbidden|无内容
|*404*|Not Found|无内容
|===


===== HTTP请求示例

====== 请求 path
----
/upload?name=string
----


====== 请求 header
[source,json]
----
0
----


===== HTTP响应示例

====== 响应 200
[source,json]
----
{
    "code": "success",
    "message": null,
    "data": {
        "accessId": "5nGlEwOIzrwCVaDZ",
        "callbackBody": "",
        "expire": 1532497705,
        "host": "https://bf-prod-srcfile.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com",
        "objectKey": "9cb19b7c92f949eda962184402cf58d5",
        "policy": "eyJleHBpcmF0aW9uIjoiMjAxOC0wNy0yNVQwNTo0ODoyNS4zNjVaIiwiY29uZGl0aW9ucyI6W1siY29udGVudC1sZW5ndGgtcmFuZ2UiLDAsNTM2ODcwOTEyMF0sWyJzdGFydHMtd2l0aCIsIiRrZXkiLCIiXV19",
        "signature": "viKQEkLuwaifs21iYPKakq6ujog="
    }
}
----
